title: Sci-Fi Exploration Themes Music Pack
description: 22 Game-Ready, Loopable, 2-minute Music Themes with Sci-Fi Flair
longDescription:
22 loopable tracks for Sci-Fi exploration games. Or any sci-fi games, really. I guess you could put them in a fantasy siege simulator if you want. Or video soundtrack. You do you. 22 tracks is what it comes down to.

Each song is 2 minutes long and loopable.

Full tracks as well as intro/loop versions are included for flexibility with your workflow.

Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/fpaSbBt372Q

Track List:

  • Abandoned Outpost
  • Ascending
  • Coastal Reef
  • Drifting Past Stars
  • Dusty Badlands
  • Fire Up the Engines
  • Low Grav
  • Lunar Ruins
  • New Fields
  • Old Growth Forest
  • Plains
  • Prefab Colony
  • Rain at Sea
  • Sand Sea
  • Sandy Beaches
  • Star Rise
  • Starset
  • Toxic Spores
  • Tundra
  • Undersea Currents
  • Combat 1
  • Combat 2
technicalDetails:

  •  2 minute long loops
  •  Full and intro/loop versions included

Number of Audio Wavs: 66
